publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4117 Bill Wilson: Safer and Stronger Renfrewshire, Third Sector Network Initiativeâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Renfrewshire Council for Voluntary Services, Renfrewshire Council and Strathclyde Police on organising the Safer and Stronger Renfrewshire - Third Sector Network initiative, which aims to ensure that local communities throughout Renfrewshire are given the chance to reach their full potential by promoting the sharing of best practice among all relevant parties and improving their coordination, and wishes all involved every success in making Renfrewshire the best possible place to live, work and invest. Supported by: Alasdair Allan*, Jamie McGrigor*, Rob Gibson*, Bob Doris*
S3M-4117 Safer and Stronger Renfrewshire, Third Sector Network Initiative (lodged on 12 May 2009) Bill Kidd*, Jamie Hepburn*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Stuart McMillan*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-4117 Safer and Stronger Renfrewshire, Third Sector Network Initiative (lodged on 12 May 2009) Hugh Henry*
